module.exports = {
  randomColor: function() {
    var colors = [];
    for (var n in Colors) { colors.push(Colors[n]); }

    return colors[colors.length * Math.random() << 0];
  },

  fromString: function(string) {
    var err = "No Matching Color. ";
    err += "Please provide a color name or literal hex number";

    if (Colors[string] != null) {
      return Colors[string];
    }

    throw err;
  },

  colors: Colors
};
